title: Ep. 522 - The Only Acceptable Form Of Racism In America
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, the professed bigot Nick Cannon has helpfully demonstrated not only what racism actually is and what it sounds like, but what form of racism is still acceptable in society. Also Five Headlines including the heroic young boy who rescued his sister from a dog attack and paid the price. We all can learn something from this kid. And in our Daily Cancellation, we’ll discuss an article on the African American History Museum’s website which says that objectivity, politeness, and science are hallmarks of white culture. Sounds pretty white supremacist to me.

Ben's new book "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" is coming out July 21st. Get your signed copy here => https://utm.io/uGvF
